metadata.title: CVE-2019-10155 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The Libreswan Project has found a vulnerability in the processing of IKEv1informational exchange packets which are encrypted and integrity protectedusing the established IKE SA encryption and integrity keys, but as areceiver, the integrity check value was not verified. This issue affectsversions before 3.29.

criterions.comment: libreswan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
